Scan set up documentation

22 April 2011

The biggest feedback I got so far on Seccubus v2 is that that a much needed piece of documentation on how to set up scans was missing.

I have pluged that hole. New documentation if up on our Seccubus v2 documentation page and will be present in the docs directory in the tarbal of new versions.

Seccubus 2.0.alpha2 released Seccubus 2.0.alpha1 released
